##Huanggang has more than 1,000 confirmed cases, and the mayor blamed 135 people a day for failing to control them

I-CAIJING

CAIJING magazine official Wechat. "CAIJING" magazine, sponsored by the China Securities Market Research Center, was first published in 1998, adhering to the news concept of "independence, exclusiveness and originality" , and is known for authoritative, impartial and professional reporting, it is a must-read publication for policy-makers, researchers and managers in the field of politics and economics.

The following article is from the e law of Finance and Economics, by Huang Shujing and Yao Jiaying

The e-law of Finance and economics is an original content brand derived from CAIJING magazine. We focus on rule of law, governance and ethics in the Internet industry.

Huanggang is the second city in the province to have more than 1,000 confirmed cases, and Huanggang's mayor has publicly admitted to inadequate preparedness, lax prevention and control measures and some cadres'lack of integrity

By Huang Shujing and Yao Jiaying, CAIJING reporters

Editor | Lu Wei

As of 2400 hours on February 2,2020,1,246 cases of COVID-19 pneumonia had been confirmed in Huanggang, 17 cases had been cured and discharged from hospitals, and 17 cases had died.

"there may be a significant increase in confirmed cases in Huanggang today and tomorrow, " Qiu Lixin, Huanggang's mayor, said at a press conference on February 1 on "the prevention and control of COVID-19 pneumonia" . On February 1, there were more than 1,000 confirmed cases in Huanggang.

Qiu Lixin at the above-mentioned press conference frankly, in response to the epidemic is not fully prepared, prevention and control measures are not strict, some cadres style is not true. "We really feel very guilty and self-blame, " Qiu Lixin said. After the outbreak, discipline inspection and supervision authorities at all levels throughout the city launched supervision and Inspection, handling and punishing 337 Party members and cadres. Six leading cadres with weak prevention and control work were removed from their posts, including three at county level and three leading Party and government leaders in townships.

As of press time, Huanggang officials have not released a list of Party members and leading cadres who have been punished. CAIJING reporters learned from many sources, a principal director of the Huanggang Health Commission, a principal director of the Huanggang Xishui County People's Congress, a principal director of the Huanggang Xishui County Tuan Po Town Party Committee, and two principal directors of the Huajiahe Town Party Committee of Hongan County, Huanggang City, were recently removed from their posts.

"CAIJING" reporters on the list to hubei-related people to verify, the other party did not comment on whether or not, only replied that: To Discipline Inspection Commission Web site notification content shall prevail. Another relevant person in Hubei responded to the CAIJING reporter that after some leading cadres were removed from their posts, relevant acts of incompetence in their duties are still being verified, so their information has not yet been made public.

Caijing noted that of the 337 Party members and cadres dealt with, 135 were dealt with in Huanggang on January 31 alone.

She said she did not have enough knowledge and preparation for the COVID-19 outbreak. At present, there are still many difficulties and challenges in the prevention and control of epidemic situation: The ability of medical treatment is still insufficient, the supplies of epidemic prevention and control are seriously short, the prevention and control of epidemic situation in rural areas is weak, the work style of some cadres is not solid, and there are still some weak links in epidemic prevention and control. "Next we will strengthen the prevention and control of key areas, spare no effort to treat patients, and manage them in a reasonable classification, classification and division. "

135 people were dealt with in one day

Huanggang is the second most populous city in the province, just over 70 km from Wuhan. About 600,000-700,000 people returned to Huanggang before the city was closed. "The huge flow of people puts a lot of pressure on prevention and control, " Qiu said

As of 2400 hours on February 2, Huanggang and Wuhan were the two largest cities in Hubei Province with more than 1,000 confirmed cases. The severity of the outbreak can not be ignored. "Huanggang must not be allowed to become a second Wuhan, " Xiaodong Wang, deputy party secretary and governor of Hubei Province, said publicly at a news conference on January 29

In the face of the grim reality, the omission of some leading cadres is more likely to arouse public criticism, but also more likely to cause serious consequences.

On January 29, the inspection team of the central committee went to Huanggang to learn about the prevention and control of the local epidemic situation and the detection of suspected cases. When asked about the capacity of designated hospitals, the number of beds, nucleic acid testing capacity, Huanggang City Health Commission director Tang Zhihong, director of the Huanggang Center for Disease Control and Chen Mingxing, inarticulate. On January 30, the Huanggang City Council announced that the Huanggang City Council had agreed to remove Tang Zhihong from his post as director of the Huanggang Health Commission.

"We really feel very guilty and self-blame, " Qiu Lixin said in response to the "Health Commission director Tang asked about the incident. "

After the inspection team of the central guidance team found the problem, the discipline inspection and supervision organs at all levels in Huanggang further strengthened their supervision and inspection of the whole city. From January 22 to January 30, the city's discipline inspection and supervision authorities at all levels sent a total of 2,862 people to inspect 5,309 key locations and sites, handling and punishing 202 people, according to the Huanggang Commission for Discipline Inspection and supervision. From January 22 to January 31, disciplinary inspection and supervision organs at all levels of the city sent a total of 3,497 people, 6416 inspection of key sites and places, a total of 337 people handled.

This means that on January 31 alone, the discipline inspection and supervision authorities in Huanggang added 635 people to the total, inspecting 1,107 key parts and places and handling 135 people.

On January 30 and January 31, the Huanggang City Commission for Discipline Inspection and supervision held a series of video conferences, demanding that party members and cadres who failed to prevent and control the epidemic should be "cut and killed" with strict wartime discipline, "The determination and most severe accountability of a strong man to break his wrist forced a change in the style of cadres. ".

At the meeting held on January 30, it was pointed out that judging from the recent cases of overt and covert visits, there are still some outstanding problems in the work style of a very small number of local and Party cadres, the determination and the most severe accountability must be used to force the change of style and the implementation of responsibilities. At the meeting on January 31, it was once again stressed that problems such as insufficient leadership attention, inadequate implementation of measures and inaccurate work style in the current epidemic prevention and control work in Huanggang remain prominent in very few places and units, we must insist on strict discipline and discipline, and urge Party members and cadres at all levels to change their style of work and take on the political responsibility of epidemic prevention and control.

Several leading cadres were removed from their posts

CAIJING reporter found through public information search that since the outbreak, two county-level cadres, Tang Zhihong, director of the Huanggang City Health Commission, and Li Baoliang, director of the Huanggang Xishui County People's Congress, have been removed from their posts, wan Xuefeng, party secretary of Tuopo town, Xishui County, Huanggang, Wang Baoquan, party secretary of Huajiahe town, Hongan County, Huanggang City, and Peng Zhihong, mayor of the town, were removed from their posts.

On February 2, the website of Hubei Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection and supervision reported 6 typical problems of "improper work style and ineffective performance of duty in prevention and control work" . In the first two cases, the four officials who had been dismissed were all from Huanggang.

The first example is the failure to implement the responsibility for prevention and control of people such as Li Baoliang, director of the Xishui County People's Congress and Secretary of the Communist Party Group of Huanggang, and Wan Xuefeng, secretary of the Party Committee of Tuopo town, li Baoliang bao-insured Tuopi town several villages in violation of the city headquarters "Six one-size-fits-all" requirements.

In a video posted by netizens on January 24, a group of three cadres from a village in Xishui County, one of them looping a recorded epidemic prevention message through a loudspeaker, another beating a gong, and one of the other cadres backing up the area, walk around the village road to promote the new coronavirus epidemic, did not wear a mask. Internet users in other villages in Xishui County, where the video was posted, said the village had not even seen such propaganda.

The second case is typical, Huanggang Hongan County, Huajiahe Town Party Committee of Epidemic Prevention and control work is not true, style is not true, poor performance, the town of a cerebral palsy patient died while his family was isolated. The party secretary of the town, Wang Baoquan, was severely warned and removed from his post by the party. The mayor, Peng Zhihong, was severely punished and removed from his post by a government official. Other responsible persons were dealt with accordingly.

On January 29,2020, Yan Cheng (cerebral palsy patient, Yan Xiaowen's elder son, 16 years old) , a close contact of Yan Xiaowen, a confirmed case of new coronavirus pneumonia, was confirmed dead in Yanjia village, Huajiahe town, Hong'an County. In the afternoon, the Hong'An County County Party Committee and the county government set up a joint investigation group led by the county public security bureau, with the participation of the heads of the County Discipline Inspection Commission, the County Health Bureau, the county disabled persons'federation and other units, to launch a comprehensive investigation into the death of Yan Cheng.

The investigation results reported on the Hong'an County government's website showed that during the epidemic prevention and control of new coronavirus pneumonia, the party committee and the government of huajiahe town, Hong'an County, had problems such as inaccurate work, inaccurate work style and inadequate implementation of the responsibility for epidemic prevention and control, with serious consequences.

In addition, Xing Tianbin, Secretary of the Party Committee of the Zaoyang Bear Market Town, Qi Benzhong, mayor of Taiping Town town, Wang Qingdu, deputy political commissar of the Tongshan County Public Security Bureau, and Xu Deyun, director of the Comprehensive Supervision and Law Enforcement Bureau of the County Health Planning Bureau; Chen Liang, deputy secretary of the Party Committee, Tai Kei Po town, Daye; Fu Yuhong, Director of the Agricultural Office; Zhu Xiao, a member of the Neighborhood Committee of Zhenjiang City community in Hao Xue, Jiangling County, Jingzhou, is one of those who failed to fulfill their responsibilities in the prevention and control of the epidemic according to the above-mentioned report by the Hubei Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection and supervision.

"We will use the strictest measures, the strictest style, the strictest management, the strictest supervision and the strictest accountability to ensure that all the plans and measures for epidemic prevention and control are thoroughly implemented and that the Split Second is well prepared to fight the epidemic, " said Wang Lishan, a member of the Standing Committee of the Hubei Provincial Party Committee, Secretary of the Provincial Discipline Inspection Committee and Director of the Provincial Supervision Committee.

[ statement ] this article is an exclusive cooperation between CAIJING and tencent news, declined to reprint
